review: Blow chrome cast away! Good UI and user friendly, and even better with a remote...great buy!
author: Edmund Baksh

review: Amazon prime actualy works quite well other than you have to have a fast internet connection  or you will be waiting in periods for your show to buffer..this can be rather frustrating.
author: Jonathan jackson

review: very cool unit,works perfect with supplied power cord,don't waste ur money on the t.v.powered usb cord they don't work
author: david moll

review: Really great when working.  Have had to reboot a couple of times when it gets stuck or can't find Wi-Fi connection.  Otherwise, love it when functioning.
author: Jonathan Benecke

review: Absolutely awesome am really enjoying all the selections, my only problem is the remote, it sticks sometimes and is so small I lose it easily!!
author: Jay
